import React, { Component } from "react";
import img1 from '../src/assets/1.jpg'

class App extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <img src={img1} />

export default App;

# çˆ¶å­é—´ä¼ å€¼

import React, { Component } from "react";
import img1 from "../src/assets/1.jpg";
import Home from "./Home";

class App extends Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super();
    this.state = {
      num: 1,
    };
  }

  onClickHandle = (props) => {
    console.log(props);
    this.setState({
      num: this.state.num+1,
    });
  };
  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <img src={img1} />
        <img src={require("../src/assets/1.jpg")} alt="" />
        <Home msg={this.state.num} onClickHandle={this.onClickHandle} />
      </div>
    );
  }
}

export default App;
import React, { Component } from 'react';

class Home extends Component {
    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                
                <h1>{this.props.msg}</h1>
                <button onClick = {this.props.onClickHandle.bind(this,'xxx')}>ç‚¹å‡»</button>
            </div>
        );
    }
}

export default Home;

# PubSub ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼

// home.jsx  --  ä¼ é€’æ•°æ®
import React, { Component } from "react";
import PubSub from "pubsub-js";

class Home extends Component {
  pubsub() {
    PubSub.publish("evt", 1);
  }
  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <button onClick={this.pubsub.bind(this)}>è¿›è¡ŒåŒçº§æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’</button>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

export default Home;
// Hello.jsx   --- ç›‘å¬æ•°æ®
import React, { Component } from "react";
import PubSub from "pubsub-js";

class Hello extends Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    PubSub.subscribe("evt", (msg, data) => {
      console.log(msg);
      console.log(data);
    });
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <h1>hello world</h1>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

export default Hello;

  1. # api æ–¹é¢
